001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.shapes;
002
003public interface Shape4D extends Shape {
004
005    default int getDimensions() {
006        return 4;
007    }
008
009    int getWidth();
010
011    int getHeight();
012
013    int getDepth();
014
015    int getCount();
016
017    static Shape4D of(Shape3D shape, int count) {
018        return of(shape.getWidth(), shape.getHeight(), shape.getDepth(), count);
019    }
020
021    static Shape4D of(int width, int height, int depth, int count) {
022        return new Shape4D() {
023            @Override
024            public int getWidth() {
025                return width;
026            }
027
028            @Override
029            public int getHeight() {
030                return height;
031            }
032
033            @Override
034            public int getDepth() {
035                return depth;
036            }
037
038            @Override
039            public int getCount() {
040                return count;
041            }
042        };
043    }
044}
